extendedInfo.description: Caligo Chaser, a beat 'em up style slash and dash action RPG game at your finger tips. Each map is tailored to automatically scroll horizontally to break free from the restrictions of the limited screen size. Stunningly well-designed stages, characters, and monsters to keep you playing for hours. Save Emporion from the dark forces that haunt the city!!âFEATURES UPGRADABLE SKILLSUp to 135 different skill upgrades combinations with 7 unique attack skills and 20 passive skillsCUSTOMIZABLE CHARACTERChange the look of you character when you equip different armor and weaponsQUESTSBeat your own score for each of the unique quests.TONS OF ITEMSOver 300 different types of items to customize your character.ââââââââââââââââCom2uS: Your first search for fun!Check out these other exciting games by Com2uS!âââââââââââââââGolf Starâ¢: Experience the most vivid game of golf ever!Tiny Pop: A new super exciting bubble shooter!9 Innings: 2013 Pro Baseball: The Ultimate Baseball game!Tiny Farm: A Tiny Farm right in the palm of your hands!Heroes Warâ¢: Assemble the ultimate force of heroes to save the world!Other fun and exciting games are available, too!ââââââââââââââââPLAY WITH Com2uS!!ââââââââââââââââFollow us!twitter.com/Com2uSLike us on Facebook!facebook.com/Com2uSTips and Updateswww.com2us.com

reviews.comment: This game is awesome, I run it on my HTC hero and it runs good. Definitely worth the money. Love this game!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Controls
reviews.comment: Love the game but after three hrs of playing, i noticed the controls suck.. Multitouch nit really used would be nice if it would.. Left arrow gets stucl down when tryong to walk and attack
reviews.author: mike lapan

reviews.comment: Great fun. Reached 70th level and no more mission. What next? Will we have update?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Average
reviews.comment: I got about 20 hours our of this game. Normally I\'d day that is great for the peice I paid. However, the action was repetitious after about 10hrs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This game has crashed on me twice and I\'ve lost all my saves. And now its too late for a refund fml
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Just installed, game play is ok. But once I save & quit then reopen, my saved data is erased... EVERYTIME! fail
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome game. Gave 4 stars, will give it 5 stars if they ever give you the option to map the controls on the keyboard to custom ones you want to set!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The game is grade a hack and slash goodness. Only change I would like is to be able to backup save files to the SD card. Game On!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Sounds save to music ... :( Other than that amazing rpg style game I am hooked literally I can\'t go to sleep just wanna keep playing hana. \"Droid x\"
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Been playing nonstop for a week now and I must say this game is fantastic! Your never too weak for the quest and the controls are perfect.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Have never had an issue with this awesome game. Hoping to see more stuff like this in market! Still to date, favorite game on EVO root 2.2, overclock!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I combined an item called Superstar, but every time I put it on the game crashes. Fix it (sprint evo)..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Download problem
reviews.comment: I just bought the application but it doesn\'t start the download of the additional package.Pls fix it,I\'d like to play with this.If you can\'t do this,then make it possible to refund.Thx in advance..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Saved the game after 4 hrs of play... saved game dissapeared. This has happened 4 times. DONT BUY until developer fixes this issue. Epic 4g
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works fine, im just not into games where i have to sit there and read for 20 min...and get a job..and walk around town talking to \"people\"
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Extremely smooth, gorgeous graphics and endless levels, the dpad needs a tad bit of work but it still doesn\'t take away from the game much. Loving it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Baz
reviews.comment: keeps closing while I\'m downloading the service pack. Starts downloading then closes halfway through. Sony Ericsson Xperia arc s 2. Wasted money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Minor spelling issues and on-screen controls take some getting used to, but overall a very solid RPG. Droid X 2.2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I\'ve been sorting through the Android market for. a while, and this game is by far one of the best! From the graphics, to the music, to the gameplay

reviews.comment: 10 hours, i\'m expecting to get bout 15, fun and pretty graphics. Galaxy s
